title: Calories in an Everything Bagel
meta_description: Discover calories in everything bagel, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and tweaks for variations like toasting or toppings.
assumptions: Standard medium bagel (~85 g), baked plain with sesame, poppy seeds, garlic, onion, and salt; no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, baking method, and toppings. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One everything bagel has about 250 kcal, with 48 g carbs and 9 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one everything bagel?
faqs.a: Approximately 250 kcal for a standard medium everything bagel.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in an everything bagel?
faqs.a: About 48 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber and 5 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is an everything bagel high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 500 mg due to the salt and seasonings on top.

faqs.q: How does everything bagel compare to plain bagel calories?
faqs.a: Similar calories (~250 kcal), but everything has more sodium from toppings.

faqs.q: Can I reduce calories in everything bagel?
faqs.a: Opt for a smaller size, whole grain version, or skip high-cal toppings like cream cheese.
